mapper.sql: image_id, user_id, project_id, project_type_id, detection_type_id, heat_image_url, physical_image_url
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM image WHERE project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND detection_type_id = #{detectionTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select i.*,sd.item_name 'detectionTypeName' from image i,sys_dictionary sd where i.detection_type_id=sd.dic_id and project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into image (image_id, user_id, project_id, project_type_id, detection_type_id, heat_image_url, physical_image_url) values (#{imageId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{detectionTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{heatImageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{physicalImageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

project_type_id = #{projectTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where image_id = #{imageId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update image set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, project_type_id = #{projectTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, detection_type_id = #{detectionTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, heat_image_url = #{heatImageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, physical_image_url = #{physicalImageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where image_id = #{imageId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
